spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Braon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save {@dc 17}), requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Braon is a 16th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). He regains his expended spell slots when he finishes a short or long rest. He knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Hexblade's Curse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Braon chooses one creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target is cursed for 1 minute. The curse ends early if the target dies, Braon dies or is {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, Braon gain the following benefits:
Braon gains a +5 bonus to damage rolls against the cursed target.
Any attack roll Braon makes against the cursed target is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.
If the cursed target dies, Braon regains 15 hit points.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Braon deals an extra 10 {@damage 3d6} damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll. Alternativly when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Braon that isn't incapacitated or no other creature then the target is within 5 feet of Braon and Braon doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, Braon can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Eldritch Mind
entries: Braon has advantage on Constitution saving throws that he make sto maintain his concentration on a spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Braon makes two attacks with Dispater's rapier.

action.name: Dispater's rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) damage.

bonus.name: Relentless Hex
entries: As a bonus action, Braon can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see within 5 feet of the target cursed by his Hexblade's Curse.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When an attacker that Braon can see hits him with an attack, he can use his reaction to halve the attack's damage against him.
